section.header: Extension of eligibility for hospital care, medical services, and nursing home and domiciliary care for certain veterans who served in a theater of combat operations
section.text: Section 1710(e)(3)(A) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking period of five years and inserting period of 10 years.
